fields.name: name
fields.label: Full Name
fields.description: Your full name displayed across the site.

fields.name: logoName
fields.label: Logo Text
fields.description: Short name or monogram shown in the navbar.

fields.name: role
fields.label: Job Title
fields.description: e.g. "Full-Stack Developer"

fields.name: location
fields.label: Location
fields.description: e.g. "Mauritius"

fields.name: hero
fields.label: üè† Hero Section
fields.description: The large landing area visitors see first.

fields.name: titleFirst
fields.label: Title ‚Äî Line 1
fields.description: First line of the hero heading.

fields.name: titleSecond
fields.label: Title ‚Äî Line 2
fields.description: Second line of the hero heading.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Subtitle
fields.description: A short tagline beneath the title.

fields.name: currentCompany
fields.label: Current Company
fields.description: Shown as a badge in the hero.

fields.name: about
fields.label: üìù About Section
fields.description: A brief introduction about you.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Bio
fields.description: Supports multiple paragraphs.

fields.name: experience
fields.label: üíº Experience
fields.description: Your work history. Drag to reorder.

fields.name: stack
fields.label: üõ† Tech Stack
fields.description: Technologies grouped by category.

fields.name: core
fields.label: Core
fields.description: Primary languages & frameworks.

fields.name: creative
fields.label: Creative
fields.description: Design, animation & visual tools.

fields.name: infrastructure
fields.label: Infrastructure
fields.description: DevOps, cloud & CI/CD.

fields.name: services
fields.label: üéØ Services
fields.description: What you offer. One item per line.

fields.name: socials
fields.label: üîó Social Links
fields.description: Add up to 4 links. Choose a display title and paste the URL.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.description: Display name, e.g. "GitHub", "LinkedIn", "Dribbble".

fields.name: url
fields.label: URL
fields.description: Full link including https://.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Project Title
fields.description: The name of the project.

fields.name: slug
fields.label: URL Slug
fields.description: Used in the URL: /projects/[slug]. Use lowercase with hyphens, e.g. "my-project".

fields.name: displayId
fields.label: Display #
fields.description: A short index number shown in the UI, e.g. "01", "02".

fields.name: order
fields.label: Sort Order
fields.description: Lower numbers appear first. Projects on the homepage are sorted by this value.

fields.name: category
fields.label: Category
fields.description: e.g. "E-Commerce", "SaaS", "Dashboard".

fields.name: year
fields.label: Year
fields.description: The year the project was completed.

fields.name: client
fields.label: Client
fields.description: Company or person. Use "Personal" for side projects.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Short Description
fields.description: One-liner shown on project cards (~120 chars).

fields.name: longDescription
fields.label: Full Description
fields.description: Detailed overview shown on the project detail page.

fields.name: challenge
fields.label: Challenge
fields.description: What problem did the project solve?

fields.name: solution
fields.label: Solution
fields.description: How you approached and resolved the challenge.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Cover Image
fields.description: Recommended 1600√ó900. Upload or paste an external URL.

fields.name: tech
fields.label: Tech Stack
fields.description: Add one technology per item, e.g. "Next.js".

fields.name: body
fields.label: Body Content
fields.description: Optional long-form content with rich formatting (Markdown).
